How do I list an item for rent?: How do I list an item for rent?
Click the \"List Item\" button in the na: Click the "List Item" button in the navigation, fill out the item details, upload photos, and set your rental price and availability.
All payments are processed securely thro: All payments are processed securely through our platform. Renters pay upfront, and owners receive payment after successful item return.
What if an item gets damaged?: What if an item gets damaged?
We offer protection for both renters and: We offer protection for both renters and owners. Report any damage immediately, and our support team will help resolve the issue.
How do I cancel a rental?: How do I cancel a rental?
You can cancel a rental up to 24 hours b: You can cancel a rental up to 24 hours before the start time for a full refund. Check our cancellation policy for more details.
